steps.name: Consultation & Analysis
steps.description: Understand business needs, assess existing systems, and design a tailored SAP solution.

steps.name: System Configuration & Customisation
steps.description: Align SAP modules with your unique business processes and requirements.

steps.name: Testing, Validation & Training
steps.description: Ensure functionality through thorough testing, validate the solution, and train end-users for effective adoption.

steps.name: Go-Live & Ongoing Support
steps.description: Transition to the live environment smoothly and provide continuous monitoring and post-implementation support.
